fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Target one person; dealing a delayed attack to them.
-Target two people; immediately attack them(2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you kill anybody, they will be displayed as killed by a role of your choosing.
-If you use your first ability; the town will receive a message "You see a shadow in the town square"
-The host is encouraged to fit the above attribute into flavor text.
-Your attacks are astral
